title: QuarkusTest failing when JAX-RS Application defined
body: ### Describe the bug A `RuntimeException` is thrown while running tests just after adding a unique JAX-RS Application class (I need to use `@OpenAPIDefinition`). This happens when you run the tests from the IDE (VS code in this case). ### Expected behavior Execute tests normally. ### Actual behavior Build failure. ### How to Reproduce? Reproducer: 1. Run `quarkus create app --extension=quarkus-resteasy --gradle` 2. Add an empty class extending `javax.ws.rs.core.Application` 3. Run `GreetingResourceTest` from VS code. 4. Test fails due to RT exception in Build step: ```code java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.RuntimeException: io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors [error]: Build step io.quarkus.resteasy.server.common.deployment.ResteasyServerCommonProcessor#build threw an exception: java.lang.RuntimeException: More than one Application class: [org.acme.ExampleApp, org.acme.ExampleApp] at io.quarkus.resteasy.server.common.deployment.ResteasyServerCommonProcessor.getAllowedClasses([ResteasyServerCommonProcessor.java:998](vscode-file://vscode-app/Applications/Visual%20Studio%20Code.app/Contents/Resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-sandbox/workbench/workbench.html)) at io.quarkus.resteasy.server.common.deployment.ResteasyServerCommonProcessor.build([ResteasyServerCommonProcessor.java:229](vscode-file://vscode-app/Applications/Visual%20Studio%20Code.app/Contents/Resources/app/out/vs/code/electron-sandbox/workbench/workbench.html)) -version` openjdk version "11.0.8" 2020-07-14 ### GraalVM version (if different from Java) _No response_ ### Quarkus version or git rev 2.15.1.Final ### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`) Gradle 7.5.1 ### Additional information The issue was detected in version 2.13.6.Final (older than the reproducer)
